Class HTTPServer.FileContextHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group4.ist412.icare412.HTTPServer.FileContextHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HTTPServer.ContextHandler
    Enclosing class:
    HTTPServer

    public static class HTTPServer.FileContextHandler
extends Object
implements HTTPServer.ContextHandler
    The FileContextHandler services a context by mapping it to a file or folder (recursively) on disk.

      • serve

        public int serve(HTTPServer.Request req,
                 HTTPServer.Response resp)
          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: HTTPServer.ContextHandler
        Serves the given request using the given response.
        Specified by:
        serve in interface HTTPServer.ContextHandler
        Parameters:
        req - the request to be served
        resp - the response to be filled
        Returns:
        an HTTP status code, which will be used in returning a default response appropriate for this status. If this method invocation already sent anything in the response (headers or content), it must return 0, and no further processing will be done
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurs
